meanings.definition: A person who manages a website.
meanings.sent1: The webmasters updated the homepage with new content.
meanings.sent2: Many webmasters use analytics to track website traffic.
meanings.sent3: The webmasters joked that the website was so popular, it needed its own zip code!
meanings.sent4: She was the webmaster of her online empire, overseeing every digital detail.
meanings.sent5: The webmasters worked tirelessly to ensure the website ran smoothly for its users.

meanings.definition: The owner or administrator of a website.
meanings.sent1: Our webmasters decided to redesign the website for a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: The webmasters were responsible for maintaining the site's security.
meanings.sent3: The webmasters proudly displayed their website's success metrics like trophies.
meanings.sent4: As the webmaster of the site, he held the digital keys to its success.
meanings.sent5: The webmasters' dedication to their website was evident in every pixel and link.
